modName: Alduin Wall Load Screen Uses Retextures
summary: Makes the Alduin\'s Wall loading screen use any texture replacements you have installed.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple fix for something that always annoyed me. If you use texture replacements for Alduin the loading screen with him on it still looks like it did in vanilla. This fixes it by redirecting the texture paths in the mesh to use the textures you have installed instead.

Textures used in screenshots:
Maleficent-Inspired Alduin http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25900/?
Rainbow Dragon Alduin http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4944/?
Classic Alduin Texture http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1532/?
Deathwing Inspired Alduin http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4086/?

There are plenty more on the Nexus, just do a quick search.
author: Deonotte

files.name: Alduin Wall Load Screen Uses Retextures

Added more screenshots with other texture replacers
